title: One-year-old girl shot; family member jailed
content:
DALLAS – Police said a relative shot a one-year-old child Friday night in Northeast Dallas.
According to DPD spokesperson Chinh Weltman, officers responded to a shooting call in the 11500 block of Ferguson Road at 7:15 p.m.
The victim, a one-year-old girl, suffered a gunshot wound and was rushed to a hospital for surgery. She was reported in critical but stable condition on Saturday morning.
Elliott Stricklin, 34, was arrested and jailed for reckless injury to a child. Bond was set at $25,000.
Weltman said police were interviewing everyone who was at the location at the time of the gunfire.
